title: Open Mic Night
flavor: Anxious poets and shaky guitars fill a tiny café with raw nerve and big feelings.

title: Gallery Opening
flavor: A friend drags you to a gallery where half the art looks like your dreams.

title: House Party
flavor: Too-loud music, sticky floors, and conversations that keep almost turning deep.

title: Writing Group Meetup
flavor: Strangers sit in a circle reading work that might be brilliant or terrible.

title: Community Workshop
flavor: A free workshop promises “unlock your inner artist” with too many worksheets.

title: Late-Night Diner Hang
flavor: After an event, everyone drifts to a greasy spoon to debrief over fries.

title: Networking Panel
flavor: A panel of “successful creatives” share tips that sound both useful and smug.
choiceB_label: Sit in the back and zone out

title: Open Studio Tour
flavor: Studios open their doors; you wander through other people’s half-finished dreams.

title: Volunteer Shift
flavor: You help run a community arts event, doing everything from setup to cleanup.

title: Book Club Night
flavor: The group swerves between talking about the book and everyone’s personal drama.

title: Small Concert
flavor: Showcase night at a dive bar; the bands range from genius to unlistenable.

title: Pop-Up Market
flavor: Local makers sell zines, prints, candles, and things you didn’t know you needed.
